title: 060 - Cake World
description: On today's show, the guys discuss Connor's recent purchase of a new jumpsuit, and the amount of hoops he had to jump through at Verizon in order to get a new cell phone. In today's FOD, the guys discuss what kind of fish they would be if they were in the sea, which fictional coach they would most like to play for, how everything we know might actually be a cake, Nick being very noble and not piling on Will Smith given his recent personal turmoils, Zito breaks down his first trip to a dispensary, plus much more. Don't forget to send in your submissions to the Folder of Death @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. Have a good one and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
